Detection of unusual SNMP queries or hig.Action: Analyze Zeek snmp.log to identify the types and frequency of SNMP queries. Establish a baseline of normal SNMP traffic patterns and identify outliers based on query types, source IPs, destination IPs, or query volume using descriptive statistics or IQR.

SNMP traffic detected originating from o.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log and snmp.log for SNMP traffic (UDP/161, TCP/161). Filter for traffic originating from or destined to external IP addresses or known malicious IPs (cross-referenced with threat intelligence feeds). Investigate SNMP sessions involving communication outside of expected internal management segments.
